column1: Appendix table 13. Estimated number of sentenced prisoners under state or federal jurisdiction, by gender, race, Hispanic origin, and age, December 31, 2008
Authors: William J. Sabol, Ph.D., Heather C. West, Ph.D., and Matthew Cooper
Appendix table 13: Estimated number of sentenced prisoners under state or federal jurisdiction, by gender, race, Hispanic origin, and age, December 31, 2008
Note: Totals based on prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year. See Methodology for estimation method.
a/Includes American Indians, Alaska Natives, Asians, Native Hawaiians, other Pacific Islanders, and persons identifying two or more races.
b/Excludes persons of Hispanic or Latino origin.
